article.author: Regent Seven Seas Cruises
article.title: Unrivaled Space at Sea™
article.lead: The luxury of personal space is central to the promise of An Unrivaled Experience® with Regent Seven Seas Cruises®. It provides the extravagant freedom you need to explore and relax to the fullest. Discover how — with its unrivaled space at sea — Regent Seven Seas Cruises® will exceed your loftiest expectations of comfort and personalized service for a truly unforgettable experience aboard The World’s Most Luxurious Fleet™.
article.embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/irx8sLBX0Sc?rel=0&showinfo=0" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

article.author: Club Med
article.title: Experience the wonders of all four seasons at Club Med Québec Charlevoix
article.lead: Opening December 2021, you will soon be able to experience Club Med’s first-ever mountain resort, open all year round: Québec Charlevoix.
article.embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/F-0LPq3bOSg?rel=0&showinfo=0" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

article.author: Oceania Cruises®
article.title: Discover Your Perfect Voyage
article.lead: Let Oceania Cruises take you on a dream voyage you will never forget. Sail among grand icons and hidden boutique ports across the globe. Explore the medieval castles and rolling countryside of Northern Europe or the colorful markets and sun-bleached ruins of the Mediterranean. Find your perfect voyage today!
